text: If signed object has no pub key and addr, verifying its signature always returns true. We should add logger warning when such case occurs. I opened a new PR, please take a look.  <https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/47>

attachments.title: Add logger warning when signed object has no pub key and addr by feihujiang · Pull Request #47 · hyperledger/sawtooth-core · GitHub
attachments.text: Signed-off-by: feihujiang <mailto:jiangfeihu@huawei.com|jiangfeihu@huawei.com> If signed object has no pub key and addr, verifying its signature always return true. We should add logger warning when such case occurs.
attachments.fallback: GitHub: Add logger warning when signed object has no pub key and addr by feihujiang · Pull Request #47 · hyperledger/sawtooth-core

text: I want to know in which case signed object could have no pub key and addr, and why?
